summary: FRONT END SHAKES AND AMOUNT INCREASES AS BRAKES ARE APPLIED.  SEVERAL DIFFERENT BRAKES PADS HAVE BEEN APPLIED.  CALIPERS HAVE BEEN REPLACED AND RECENTLY THE CV AXLES NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  AFTER A FEW WEEKS THE PROBLEM IS RECURRING.  MAKES VEHICLE FEEL UNSAFE ESPECIALLY WHEN BRAKING.    *NLM
